translations: 交配繁殖；饲养，培育；养育，培养；引起，酿成；（通过核反应）增殖可裂变物质

sentences.sentence: He used to breed dogs for the police.
sentences.translation: 他过去为警察部门养殖狗。

sentences.sentence: Frogs will usually breed in any convenient pond.
sentences.translation: 青蛙通常在任何适宜的水塘里繁殖。

sentences.sentence: Many animals breed only at certain times of the year.
sentences.translation: 很多动物只在一年的某个时候交配繁殖。
